channel.title: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]

item.title: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @runeball runeball
item.description:
@runeball wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:552533”]Your error is because the method “sendOption3” is private, and you are calling the method from outside of the class.

All you have to do is change the word “private” to “public”.
Like this:

to this:

dahm how didn’t i see that i watched like 20 minuts to my dialogue.java

Thanks for the help sk8rdude461

Read full topic
item.source: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]

item.title: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your error is because the method “sendOption3” is private, and you are calling the method from outside of the class.

All you have to do is change the word “private” to “public”.
Like this:

to this:

Read full topic
item.source: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]

item.title: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @runeball runeball
item.description:
@runeball wrote:

hey mopar.

i feel like a shame because i can’t solve this problem but i need to get it solved so hopefully somebody of you guys can help me.

I got a teleport in my magebook and it opens an option menu with 5 options. I only have 3 bosses so i need 3 options.

so this is what i tryed.

In my Actionbuttons.java i had this code

case 50253: case 4146: c.getDH().sendOption5("Godwars Dungeon", "King Black Dragon @bla@[@red@!!Danger!!@bla@]", "Dagannoth Kings", "Chaos Elemental @bla@[@red@!!Danger!!@bla@]", "Kalphite Queen"); c.teleAction = 3; break;

So i changed it to

case 50253: case 4146: c.getDH().sendOption3("King Black Dragon", "Chaos Elemental", "Kalphite Queen"); c.teleAction = 3; break;

What did i do
I changed the c.getDH().sendOption5 to c.getDH().sendOption3 and i deleted 2 of the teleport names because i only want 3 options.

After that i changed the teleports so every option would be teleporting to the right spot and i deleted the last 2 Teleports.

Now i got this as teleports.

//1st tele option case 9190: String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; if (c.teleAction == 1) { //rock crabs c.getPA().spellTeleport(2676, 3715, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 2) { //barrows c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 3) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3007, 3849, 0); c.sendMessage("Climb down the ladder to get into the lair."); } else if (c.teleAction == 4) { //mage bank c.getPA().spellTeleport(3086, 3516, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 5) { //mining pits c.getPA().spellTeleport(3046,9779,0); } else if (c.teleAction == 6) { //Thieving area- new tele c.getPA().spellTeleport(3178,3410,0); } else if (c.teleAction == 9) { //home c.getPA().startTeleport(2894, 3532, 0, type); // }

//2nd tele option case 9191: if (c.teleAction == 1) { //tav dungeon c.getPA().spellTeleport(2884, 9798, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 2) { //pest control c.getPA().spellTeleport(2662, 2650, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 3) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3295, 3921, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 4) { //graveyard c.getPA().spellTeleport(2978, 3616, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 5) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3079,9502,0); } else if (c.teleAction == 6) { //Shopping area new tele //c.sendMessage("Suggest where to put the shopping area on the forums!"); //c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); c.getPA().spellTeleport(2777, 2767, 0); c.sendMessage("Still working on the shops. Suggest what you want in the shops if you want."); } else if (c.teleAction == 9) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3223,3218,0); //Lumbridge }

case 9192: if (c.teleAction == 1) { //slayer tower c.getPA().spellTeleport(3428, 3537, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 2) { //tzhaar c.getPA().spellTeleport(2441, 5171, 0); c.sendMessage("To fight Jad, enter the cave."); } else if (c.teleAction == 3) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3483, 9483, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 4) { //44 portals c.getPA().spellTeleport(3244, 3512, 0); } else if (c.teleAction == 5) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2813,3436,0); } else if (c.teleAction == 6) { //Snow PK area, new tele c.getPA().spellTeleport(2951,3931,0); } else if (c.teleAction == 9) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3214,3424,0); //Varrock }

After doing this i thought it would work, but it didn’t because it gave me this error.

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1002: error: sendOption3(S tring,String,String) has private access in DialogueHandler c.getDH().sendOption3("King Black Dragon", "Chaos Elemen tal", "Kalphite Queen"); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

and the funny thing is if i change

case 50253: case 4146: c.getDH().sendOption3("King Black Dragon", "Chaos Elemental", "Kalphite Queen"); c.teleAction = 3; break;

to

case 50253: case 4146: c.getDH().sendOption5("King Black Dragon", "Chaos Elemental", "Kalphite Queen","",""); c.teleAction = 3; break;

it will work again

Can somebody explain me what i did wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Making 3 options in a teleport error [Solved]
